profile.likes: His tribe, leisurely reading, fish & seafood dishes

background.story: As the Empire expanded its territory, the long occupying natives resisted relentlessly. However, they all eventually fell before the Empire's brutal military force as well as overwhelming technology. Dakaris' homeland, the reclusive Lake Eretana, hidden deep inside the mountains, was no exception. The Empire let the natives stay in their land, but by no means were they treated with respect. To make things worse, the officers and nobles appointed to the area were mostly corrupted, making it even more difficult for the natives. The noble appointed to Lake Eretana was especially the worse. The atrocities grew worse each day, eventually leading to the deaths of young, and innocent Lizardmen. This lead Dakaris to gather his tribe to get back their freedom. 'To soothe the spirits of my ancestors, and to liberate my tribe - I will not hesitate, I will take back our rightful future with the Resistance.' Currently, he is a key member of the Resistance, leading them with his wisdom and insight.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A treasure of the tribe that was hidden deep inside Lake Eretana. It contains hundreds of years of Lizardmen wisdom and magic. Its power is normally calm like still water, but this magical item can unleash devastating tsunami-like power if a user wishes to.
treasures: Dakaris' favorite and signature dish. It is one of the dishes that represent his tribe. It is a dish made with crawfish, clams, and many sides. He normally eats fish, but dines on this on special occasions.

A trinket Dakaris received from his parents. This bracelet is made with intertwined gold and silver bracelets. It is a traditional wedding bracelet that symbolizes everlasting bond. Dakaris has this bracelet as a memento of his parents.

A ceremonial dagger used by the Lizardmen of Lake Eretana. It was used as a decoration, especially in festivals and coming of age ceremonies. However, after the Empire's invasion, it got customized as a weapon by imbuing it with magic.

A spellbook passed down from generation to generation. This is renowned as a history book passed down to the next sage of the tribe. It holds history of war, footsteps of great individuals, everyday life of the tribe, and many more. It has mystical power to bring those records out into reality for a little while via magic.
